pullrequest.title: Launch file and 5 example worlds for finals

content.raw:
Hi @chapulina , just a quick question: how can we configure the gazebo log file in these scripts ?  

Similar to what we have with gazebo :  $ gzserver -r --record_path ~/gazebo-logs/myworldlog

thanks in advance!
content.html:
Hi @chapulina , just a quick question: how can we configure the gazebo log file in these scripts ?

Similar to what we have with gazebo : $ gzserver -r --record_path ~/gazebo-logs/myworldlog

thanks in advance!
